name: Hiladdar_Core
title: Hiladdar's Core
author: Hiladdar
description: Research technology to increase player inventory, logistic, and trash slots and improve mining speed.  Also new repair packs, axe, lights, and radars.  All new of Hiladdar's items from other mods are consolodated in their own crafting tab.  Includes an option to obliterate cliffs on the map at the start of a new game.
